citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility houses one (1) infant capuchin. However, the nonhuman primate environment enhancement plan does not
contain a section addressing the special attention required for certain nonhuman primates, such as infants and young
juveniles. An incomplete environment enhancement plan can negatively impact animal welfare if adequate environment
enhancement is not provided due to a lack of detail in the plan. Nonhuman primate environment enhancement plans must
address certain nonhuman primates that must be provided special attention regarding enhancement of their environment,
such as infants and young juveniles and other categories defined in this subsection. Correct by August 20, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
